attributes.title: watering my cow✨💦🐮
attributes.review: This app is atrocious!!! I downloaded it in hopes of finding something in trump’s plans about fighting for my cows rights to be watered! The amount of discrimination and oppression my poor watering cow has gone through because people make fun of him for needing to be watered. When i opened the app i was appalled to be met with elmo hanging from a ceiling fan by a rope around his neck!!!!! and then i saw a dancing rat who started to make fun of watering cows!!!!!!! despise this app and the way it makes my poor cow feel! WateringCow2020!!!!!!!! BYE ORANGE PEEL

attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.title: No I am not part of this gen z thing
attributes.review: I just really didn’t think it was a great platform. It sucked really. Right off the bat I get asked for my phone number, witch I don’t really mind. But here’s the twist. It kept lagging. And lagging . So I closed the app. Wouldn’t open back up again. I would try to open up the app and it would close itself. And I just got a new phone so that’s not it. And I really just think it needs a lot of improvement in general.

attributes.title: This app is not good😻
attributes.review: I got this app because I wanted to see what the “hype” was about, I downloaded it and when I opened it it said to put in my phone number after I did that I started getting sent weird naked pictures of grandmas I tried to block the number but they kept texting me on new ones telling me “vote for Donald trump” everyone with a new naked picture of a grandma it’s not a kid friendly app and i DO NOT recommend it. thank you for your time.

attributes.title: GEN Z
attributes.review: worst app ever!! starting from the colors🤢, to the picture of trump, and his name all over the app, low key made me wanna throw up. anyways, if he wants to get rid of tiktok, looks like he won’t have his app, the only reason he wants to ban tiktok is bec HE KNOWS gen z is powerful, he knows this is how we communicate, think about it, the only reason we’re dropping these one stars is bec we saw it on tiktok and we all hate him, HE NEEDS TO GO not tiktok. i hope this app gets deleted from the app store🥰

attributes.title: don’t get this app...
attributes.review:
i downloaded it because my mom, karen, couldn’t get the app on her iphone 4. :( 

when i downloaded it she said that it kept crashing and she couldn’t get out of the app without turning my phone off completely...

she thinks it’s also stealing our information like trump thinks China is stealing info from tiktok! CRAZY, right? anyways she wanted to rate this app 0/5 stars, so she wants the app store to make that possible. or she will talk to ur manager. TPWK EVERYONE HAVE A GOOD DAY

attributes.title: this app is a hoax and conspiracy
attributes.review: wow as a die hard MAGA fan, i couldn’t believe how awful this app was! I noticed it kept playing this strange music like high pitched sounds. i believe that this is the government tracking us. THEY ARE TRACKING US ALL NOW. THE GOVERNMENT IS GOING TO COME TO OUR HOUSES AND MURDER US ALL. UGH it kept shutting down, it even shut my whole phone down. and the picture in the app, who is that man? UGH!! WHO IS THAT????? when did the devil get a new look?? orange hair?? since when??? this is theeeee worst app ever, i’m so sad ugh f 45&f 12

attributes.title: wish i could rate lower!!
attributes.review: as a trump follower, i downloaded this app to get the latest on election plans and rallies i could attend. i set down my phone to let the app download as i watched Trump’s press conference, actually. when i return to my phone, i see that EVERY OTHER APP HAD BEEN DELETED, MY PHOTOS WIPED, MY CONTACTS ERASED. the only things i have on my phone as of right now are the base apple apps and this Trump app. i am very scared because if they took my contacts and photos, what else did they take?
